judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Mtjsmanno, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the lower court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Levinthal which ably covers the facts and the law involved.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Ralph B. Umsted, with him John P. Hilferty, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Salkin v. James, Appellant.
Argued November 18, 1953.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Mtjsmanno, JJ.
Ralph B. Umsted, with him John P. Hilferty, for appellant.
Abraham- J. Levinson, for appellee.
January 14, 1954:
